chunks.zh: 冬天双手冰凉是肾虚吗？
chunks.en: Is having cold hands in winter a sign of kidney deficiency?

chunks.zh: 这几天温度零下几度，双手和钢铁一样冰，
chunks.en: These past few days the temperature has been several degrees below zero, and my hands are as cold as steel.

chunks.zh: 请问这是是肾虚吗？应该怎么调理有效？
chunks.en: Is this a sign of kidney deficiency? What's an effective way to regulate it?

chunks.zh: 手冷=散热少手热=散热多在产热不变情况下，散热少=体温保障散热多=体温下降血管收缩=散热减少血管扩张=散热增加喝酒=血管扩张所以冬天喝酒，你会感觉很热，但实际上容易体温失温在产热不变的情况下，环境温度低，手冷说明你身体在减少散热，维持核心温度，恰恰是正常的身体机能。
chunks.en: Cold hands = less heat dissipation. Hot hands = more heat dissipation. When heat production is constant, less heat dissipation = body temperature protection. More heat dissipation = body temperature decreases. Vasoconstriction = less heat dissipation. Vasodilation = increased heat dissipation. Drinking alcohol = vasodilation. So when you drink alcohol in the winter, you feel very hot, but in reality, you are prone to hypothermia. When heat production is constant, and the ambient temperature is low, cold hands indicate that your body is reducing heat dissipation to maintain core temperature, which is precisely normal bodily function.

chunks.zh: 所以，如何让手脚不冷，就是提高产热身体的产热是有多种因素决定的，比如基础代谢我就举个例子，骨骼肌越多，基础代谢越大
chunks.en: Therefore, how to keep your hands and feet warm is to increase heat production. The body's heat production is determined by various factors, such as basal metabolism. For example, the more skeletal muscle you have, the higher your basal metabolism will be.

chunks.zh: 肾虚就是口袋病。
chunks.en: Kidney deficiency is just a money-grabbing scheme.

chunks.zh: 我也从小冬天手脚冰凉，去年体检完以后去三甲看过医生，说：信中医我就给你开个药方长期吃，你去中医院他们可能说你是肾虚，开的也差不多。
chunks.en: I've had cold hands and feet since I was a child. After a physical examination last year, I went to a top-tier hospital to see a doctor, who said: If you believe in traditional Chinese medicine, I'll give you a prescription to take long-term. If you go to a TCM hospital, they'll probably say you have kidney deficiency and prescribe something similar.

chunks.zh: 不信我就告诉你，你也不是亚健康，肾功能评估的数据都正常，你就是散热少，完全是因人而异。
chunks.en: If you don't believe in it, I'll tell you, you're not sub-healthy, the data from your kidney function evaluation are normal, you just dissipate less heat, it's completely individual.

chunks.zh: 男人肾虚，女人宫寒😅
chunks.en: Kidney deficiency for men, uterus cold for women 😅

chunks.zh: 1.穿多点2.吃多点如果不行可能是1.可能是肾阳虚2.可能是营卫之气的问题（比如说中间堵了）3.脾胃问题4.筋脉问题去看看有名点的中医，千万别自己治。（自撰一良方，服之，卒）可能给你吃中药，可能给你灸，可能是给你针，可能是给你贴中药贴。
chunks.en: 1. Wear more clothes 2. Eat more. If that doesn't work, it could be 1. Kidney yang deficiency 2. A problem with the Ying and Wei Qi (e.g., blockage in the middle) 3. Spleen and stomach problems 4. Meridian problems. See a reputable TCM doctor, and never treat yourself. (Write your own good prescription, take it, and die). They might give you Chinese medicine, moxibustion, acupuncture, or medicinal patches.

chunks.zh: 虽然我反中医吧。
chunks.en: Although I'm against traditional Chinese medicine.

chunks.zh: 但是中医存活至今，也没原始到只靠单一症状就能看病的程度。
chunks.en: But TCM has survived to this day, and it's not so primitive that it can diagnose based solely on a single symptom.

chunks.zh: 你去中医院，医生也会问问你有没有其他症状，搞搞“望闻问切”之类的。
chunks.en: If you go to a TCM hospital, the doctor will also ask you if you have other symptoms and do things like 'inspection, auscultation and olfaction, inquiry, and palpation'.

chunks.zh: 所以无论你信不信中医，身体问题都不要上网问，更不要自己吃药调理。
chunks.en: So whether you believe in TCM or not, don't ask about your health problems online, and don't take medicine to regulate yourself.

chunks.zh: 中医再不靠谱，退一万步也是经验，也比无证爱好者瞎研究的强。
chunks.en: Even if TCM is unreliable, at the very least it's based on experience, which is better than unlicensed enthusiasts doing random research.

chunks.zh: 如果有人不承认这点，那只能说明他自己就不信的中医。
chunks.en: If someone doesn't acknowledge this, it can only mean that they themselves don't believe in TCM.

chunks.zh: 是折翼的天使（狗头）
chunks.en: It's a fallen angel (doge)

chunks.zh: 是的，看中医
chunks.en: Yes, see a TCM doctor

chunks.zh: 科学一点好不好....谁零下几度 不动的情况下手不凉.....你要是在搬砖 你看凉不凉
chunks.en: Can we be a bit more scientific... Who wouldn't have cold hands when it's several degrees below zero and they're not moving... If you were carrying bricks, would you be cold?

chunks.zh: 开空调。
chunks.en: Turn on the air conditioning.

chunks.zh: 就是血液循环弱。
chunks.en: It's just poor blood circulation.

chunks.zh: 肾只是其中一个因素，心肺功能感觉占比更大。
chunks.en: The kidneys are only one factor, it seems that cardiovascular function is more important.

chunks.zh: 实测，但凡晚饭吃少了，冬天就容易冷，吃饱吃热乎点就没有这个问题。
chunks.en: In practice, if you eat too little dinner, you're more likely to be cold in the winter. Eating a full, warm meal solves this problem.

chunks.zh: 去跑步，跑着跑着热了，肾不虚了，说明短跑治肾虚跑 20 公里，不吃补给，手开始发冷了，说明长跑对肾不好 doge
chunks.en: Go for a run, if you get warm while running, then you don't have kidney deficiency, which means that sprinting cures kidney deficiency. Run 20 kilometers without supplements, and your hands start to get cold, which means that long-distance running is bad for the kidneys doge

chunks.zh: 坐标江苏，去年 12 月份，有一阵子特别冷，晚上回到住的地方，手被冻的实在熬不住，也怀疑过是不是自己身体不行，直到买了个暖风机，打开差不多半个多小时，附近体感温度上升了，别说手了，直接把鞋一脱，穿着脱鞋，可舒服了，当然，随着温度的提升，电费也蹭蹭往上涨，7 天无理由的最后一天，还是把他退掉了，买了几十个一次性暖手贴，效果还挺不错，推荐去拼多多买，比京东的要便宜很多。
chunks.en: Located in Jiangsu, last December there was a particularly cold spell. When I returned to my place at night, my hands were so frozen that I couldn't stand it. I suspected that my body wasn't working properly, until I bought a space heater. After turning it on for about half an hour, the ambient temperature nearby rose. Not to mention my hands, I took off my shoes and wore slippers, it was so comfortable. Of course, as the temperature increased, the electricity bills also went up. On the last day of the 7-day no-reason return policy, I returned it. I bought dozens of disposable hand warmers, and the effect was pretty good. I recommend buying them on Pinduoduo, they are much cheaper than on Jingdong.

chunks.zh: 手脚冰冷，排除外在的衣物，直接原因是血液流到手脚的流量太小，也就是心脏搏动强度偏弱，所以可以增强心肺功能，也就是 hit 或者变速跑
chunks.en: Cold hands and feet, excluding external clothing, the direct cause is that the blood flow to the hands and feet is too small, which means that the heart's pumping strength is weak, so you can enhance cardiovascular function, which is HIT or interval running.

chunks.zh: 如果要用中医来解释那就是心阳透达不到全身，因为心为火，基本上全身的热都靠它。
chunks.en: If you want to use TCM to explain it, it means that the heart yang can't reach the whole body, because the heart is fire, and basically all the heat in the body depends on it.

chunks.zh: 西医经常是越治身体越冷，明显是有问题的。
chunks.en: Western medicine often makes the body colder the more it's treated, which is obviously problematic.

chunks.zh: 心阳无法透达，也可能是心阳自己很弱，一个是阳行不到全身。
chunks.en: The heart yang cannot be transmitted, maybe the heart yang itself is very weak, one is that the yang cannot circulate to the whole body.

chunks.zh: 心就像汽车发动机，肝血为燃料，肝血不足也会导致心阳不足从而无法透达，又或者是肺金不够清凉，所谓清肺清肺，目的就是冷却发动机从而可以让发动机拉更高的转速。
chunks.en: The heart is like a car engine, and liver blood is the fuel. Insufficient liver blood can also lead to insufficient heart yang, which prevents it from being transmitted, or the lung metal is not cool enough. The purpose of clearing the lungs is to cool the engine so that the engine can run at higher speeds.

chunks.zh: 所以问题得辩证去看，看是什么证，随症而调整。
chunks.en: So the problem must be viewed dialectically, to see what the syndrome is, and adjust according to the syndrome.

chunks.zh: 以前我也会，海狗丸吃了两年，基本没出现过了
chunks.en: I used to have it too. After taking Seal Oil Pills for two years, it basically stopped happening.

chunks.zh: 是你家没开暖气
chunks.en: It's because you don't have the heating on at home.

chunks.zh: 多导导体质就上去了
chunks.en: The conductivity constitution will go up.

chunks.zh: 户外走个两公里，你看看手还凉不凉。。。
chunks.en: Walk two kilometers outdoors, and see if your hands are still cold...
